summary: It\'s written \"black hooded robe\" not \"crapy muddy robe\"
descriptionHtml:
I was just pissed off to look like a hobo instead of a powerfull warlock/assassin when wearing these robes so i just changed the color.

WARNING: i\'m no modder or designer (or anything at all actually) all I did is open pse and use the \"reduce light\" + \"reduce saturation\" to the texture file, this doesn\'t even deserve a \"thanks\"!!!

If you have any question or remark feel free! And if you want another (as basic as this one) recolor feel free to ask (I don\'t promise anything)! 

EDIT: For those who\'d like their black robe blacker but don\'t want the \"wet\" effect, I added a second version with a lighter blackening effect and a litte sharpening effect. That\'s the best I can do :/
author: KoRevas
